channel.title: Case for item
channel.description:
Hi,
What do i need to search with ctrl + f where the case's for this items are like clue scrolls or other stuff I cant find it..
Delta based.

item.title: Case for item
item.dc:creator: @C4ll3r C4ll3r
item.description:
@C4ll3r wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:8, topic:324069”]Usually there’s an ItemClicking1 packet which handles a lot of item clicking.

OR

It could be Checkforskilluse3 in client.java

You should have a switch which handles cases like eating food, or burying bones.

switch (itemID) { case cluescrollID: showInterface(cluescrollinterfaceID); sendQuest("", cluescrollsendQuestID); sendQuest("", cluescrollsnedQuestID); break; }[/quote]
This is what i need ty !![br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 06, 2010, 09:16:08 am[/size][hr]:S dont have that nr 3 yet :S can u post urs pls??

Read full topic

item.title: Case for item
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

Usually there’s an ItemClicking1 packet which handles a lot of item clicking.

OR

It could be Checkforskilluse3 in client.java

You should have a switch which handles cases like eating food, or burying bones.

switch (itemID) { case cluescrollID: showInterface(cluescrollinterfaceID); sendQuest("", cluescrollsendQuestID); sendQuest("", cluescrollsnedQuestID); break; }

Read full topic

item.title: Case for item
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

If you’re looking for the item ID’s, look in the item configuration file.

If you’re trying to edit what occurs when a clue scroll is clicked, it may be under a switch statement or there may be a packet for it.

Read full topic
